formulas.name: varBillRates
formulas.expression:
"
" + "Effective Start Date
" + TEXT ({!Effective_Start_Date_Mandatory}) + "
" + "Bill Rate Standard
"+ TEXT ({!Bill_Rate_Standard}) +"
" + "Bill Rate Overtime
"+ TEXT ({!Bill_Rate_Overtime}) +"
" + "Bill Rate Double Time
" + TEXT ({!Bill_Rate_Double_Time})

formulas.description: Formula for Pay and Bill Rage
formulas.name: varPayandBillRate
formulas.expression:
"
" + "Effective Start Date
" + TEXT ({!Effective_Start_Date_Mandatory}) + "
" + "Bill Rate Standard
"+ TEXT ({!Bill_Rate_Standard}) +"
" + "Bill Rate Overtime
"+ TEXT ({!Bill_Rate_Overtime}) +"
" + "Bill Rate Double Time
" + TEXT ({!Bill_Rate_Double_Time}) + "Pay Rate Standard
"+ TEXT ({!Pay_Rate_Standard}) +"
" + "Pay Rate Overtime
"+ TEXT ({!Pay_Rate_Overtime}) +"
" + "Pay Rate Double Time
" + TEXT ({!Pay_Rate_Double_Time})

formulas.name: varPayRates
formulas.expression:
"
" + "Effective Start Date
" + TEXT ({!Effective_Start_Date_Mandatory}) + "
" + "Pay Rate Standard
"+ TEXT ({!Pay_Rate_Standard}) +"
" + "Pay Rate Overtime
"+ TEXT ({!Pay_Rate_Overtime}) +"
" + "Pay Rate Double Time
" + TEXT ({!Pay_Rate_Double_Time})

formulas.name: varRequestDetails
formulas.expression:
"Request
" + "Placement ID: " + TEXT ({!Placement_ID})+ "
" + "First Name: " + {!First_Name} + "
" + "Last Name " + {!Last_Name} + "
" + "Request Summary: " + {!Request_Summary_Screen} + "
" + IF ({!Require_Change} == 'Allocation and Producers', {!varAllocationandProducers}, "") + IF ({!Require_Change} == 'Assignment Extension', {!varAssignmentExtension}, "") + IF ({!Require_Change} == 'Assignment Start Date Delay', {!varAssignmentStartDateDelay}, "") + IF ({!Require_Change} == 'Bill Rates', {!varBillRates}, "") + IF ({!Require_Change} == 'Contract to Hire', {!varContracttoHire}, "") + IF ({!Require_Change} == 'Customer Level Changes', {!varCustomerLevelChanges}, "") + IF ({!Require_Change} == 'End Assignment', {!varEndAssignment}, "") + IF ({!Require_Change} == 'Others', {!varOthers} , "") + IF ({!Require_Change} == 'Pay Rates', {!varPayRates}, "") + IF ({!Require_Change} == 'Pay and Bill Rate', {!varPayandBillRate}, "") + IF ({!Require_Change} == 'Placement Status Change', {!varPlacementStatusChange} , "") + IF ({!Require_Change} == 'Time Sheet Approvers', {!varTimeSheetApprovers} , "") + IF ({!Require_Change} == 'Others', {!varOthers}, "")

formulas.name: varTimeSheetApprovers
formulas.expression:
"
" + "Effective Date: " + TEXT ({!Effective_Start_Date_Mandatory}) + "Primary Approver First Name: " + {!Primary_Approver_First_Name} + "
" + "Primary Approver Last Name: " + {!Primary_Approver_Last_Name}+ "
" + "Primary Approver Email address: " + {!Primary_Approver_Email}+ "
" + "Primary Approver Phone Number: " + {!PrimaryApproverPhone}+ "
" + "Alternate Approver First Name: " + {!Alternate_Approver_First_Name}+ "
" + "Alternate Approver Last Name: " + {!Alternate_Approver_Last_Name}+ "
" + "Alternate Approver Email address: " + {!Alternate_Approver_Email_address}+ "
" + "Alternate Approver Phone Number: " + {!AlternateApproverPhone}
